objects.text:
• Military-Grade Materials
• Superior Arch Support
• Slip-Resistant Outsole
• Quick-Access Side Zipper

product_details.name: Jungle Boot
product_details.description:
Introducing the Woobies Jungle Boot—where Tactical Roots meet modern versatility.
 Built with Iconic Military Heritage and upgraded with a low profile non-rattle zipper for quick access, these boots offer durable military-grade materials, superior arch support, and slip resistant soles while maintaining a zero drop shoe. 
Ready for any terrain, they blend rugged reliability with modern comfort, making them the perfect choice for any mission. After years of testing and development we can confidently say this is Woobies at it’s absolute best. 
Improved insole for better arch support
Reinforced slip resistant outsole 
Low profile non-rattle side zipper

banner_details:
The banner design presents a modern and bold layout ideal for showcasing a tactical footwear product. It is visually divided into four quadrants using a sharp grid system overlaid on a dark-toned background. The left upper quadrant features the primary heading text layers (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) styled in bold white sans-serif, emphasizing the product name. Below it, the tagline (`tagline`) is in sleek, muted typography. The product image (`product_image`) is prominently displayed on the right, slightly overlapping quadrants for added depth. The lower left quadrant includes a features list (`description`), a bold price tag (`price`), and a call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`). Geometric decorative lines and subdued circular shapes add a modern militaristic touch.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Charcoal: `#222222`
- Olive Green: `#4B5320`
- Dark Gray: `#333333`
- Army Green: `#5D6636`
- Cream Beige: `#D1C7A3`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a rugged high-top boot with a sophisticated two-tone color scheme. The primary colors are military olive green (#5B6734) on the canvas upper and matte black (#1F1F1F) for the leather overlays and sole. The blend of colors provides a tactical and utilitarian aesthetic, with the green symbolizing durability and outdoor utility, while the black adds contrast, sleekness, and strength. Stitching details use darker shades like deep olive (#4C552A) to highlight structural design without overpowering the look. For an advertisement banner, the color palette can include olive green, matte black, gray (#3C3C3C), and a muted beige (#CFCBB7) for background balance.
